Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the name of the pipe that was created by the request.

GetAtt.Description: The time the pipe was created.
The state the pipe is in.
When the pipe was last updated, in ISO-8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD).
The reason the pipe is in its current state.
